channel.title: Donator TICKET'S
channel.description:
So i was wondering if i can make a shop cost donator TIOKETS not donator POINTS.
I want a shop that you can buy with Donator tickets.
For E.X. a torva platebody cost 5 tickets (5 dollars)
I have a shop i just need it to be worth Donator TICKETS
Thanks, Keith

item.title: Donator TICKET'S
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, you need to pick whether you want it to cost TIOKETS or TICKETS.

Jokes aside.

Find where itâ€™s assigning the points as money, and replace it with the ID of the tickets
